medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient endorses sharp, severe, mid-abdominal pain since approximately 7 hours prior to presentation, which has since shifted slightly towards his right lower quadrant in the past few hours. Pain worsens when he sits up. Concomitantly, he reports an episode of subjective fevers and diaphoresis 3 days ago, as well as nausea and non-bloody, non-bilious emesis 2 days ago, all of which have since resolved.
medical_history.family_history: No history of inflammatory bowel disease or GI malignancies.
